pizza.title: Homemade Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C)
Roll out the dough on a floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly
Add cheese and toppings
Bake for 12-15 minutes

burger.title: Classic Burger
instructions: Season and grill the patty
Toast the buns lightly
Assemble with toppings
Serve immediately

sushi.title: California Roll
instructions: Spread rice on nori sheet
Add fillings in center
Roll tightly using bamboo mat
Slice into pieces

butter chicken.title: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric and 1 tsp garam masala for 2 hours
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked
In a pan, melt butter and add tomato puree. Cook for 5 minutes
Add cream, remaining garam masala, and kasuri methi
Add cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh cream and serve with naan

biryani.title: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
instructions: Soak rice for 30 minutes. Parboil with whole spices
Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric and biryani masala for 1 hour
In a heavy-bottomed pot, layer half the rice, then chicken, fried onions, mint and coriander
Top with remaining rice and saffron milk
Seal with dough or foil and cook on dum (low heat) for 25 minutes
Mix gently before serving with raita

dosa.title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Soak rice, dal and fenugreek for 6 hours. Grind to smooth batter
Ferment overnight (8-10 hours)
For filling: Temper mustard seeds, add onions, chilies, curry leaves
Add mashed potatoes, turmeric and salt. Mix well
Spread dosa batter on hot tawa, drizzle oil, cook until crisp
Add potato filling, fold and serve with chutney and sambar

paneer tikka.title: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Mix yogurt, besan and all spices to make marinade
Add paneer and vegetables. Marinate for 1 hour
Skewer alternating pieces of paneer and vegetables
Brush with oil and grill in oven or tandoor for 10-12 minutes
Sprinkle chaat masala and serve with mint chutney

dal tadka.title: Dal Tadka
instructions: Pressure cook dal with turmeric until soft
In a pan, heat ghee and temper cumin seeds and red chilies
Add onions, sauté until golden. Add tomatoes and spices
Mix in cooked dal and simmer for 5 minutes
Finish with garam masala and fresh coriander
Serve hot with rice or roti

pav bhaji.title: Mumbai Pav Bhaji
instructions: Mash all boiled vegetables together
In a large tawa, melt butter and sauté onions until translucent
Add capsicum, cook for 2 minutes. Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates
Add mashed vegetables, pav bhaji masala, chili powder and salt
Mash everything together while cooking for 10 minutes
Toast pav in butter and serve with bhaji, onions and lemon

chole bhature.title: Chole Bhature
instructions: Pressure cook chickpeas with tea bags until soft
In a pan, sauté onion puree until brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato puree
Add all spices and cooked chickpeas. Simmer for 15 minutes
For bhature: Knead soft dough with maida, yogurt, sugar and salt
Rest for 2 hours. Roll into circles and deep fry until puffed
Serve hot chole with bhature and pickled onions

idli sambar.title: Idli with Sambar
instructions: Soak rice and dal separately for 4 hours. Grind to smooth batter
Ferment overnight. Pour into idli molds and steam for 10 minutes
For sambar: Cook dal and vegetables together until soft
Add sambar powder, tamarind and salt. Simmer for 5 minutes
Temper mustard seeds and curry leaves in oil. Add to sambar
Serve hot idlis with sambar and coconut chutney

rajma chawal.title: Rajma Chawal
instructions: Soak rajma overnight. Pressure cook until tender
Heat oil, temper cumin seeds. Add onions and sauté until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste, then tomato puree. Cook until oil separates
Add all spices and cooked rajma. Simmer for 15 minutes
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with steamed rice

vada pav.title: Mumbai Vada Pav
instructions: For vada: Temper mustard seeds, add curry leaves and green chilies
Add mashed potatoes, turmeric and salt. Mix well and make balls
Make batter with besan, baking soda and water (pancake consistency)
Dip potato balls in batter and deep fry until golden
Slice pav, spread chutneys, place vada inside
Serve with fried green chilies

masala chai.title: Masala Chai
instructions: Boil water with all whole spices for 3-4 minutes
Add tea leaves and boil for 1 minute
Add milk and bring to boil. Strain into cups
Adjust sugar as per taste
Serve hot with snacks
